entities.name: ministry
entities.description: The Ministry is mentioned as a place of dread for Harry, where he fears being expelled and his wand snapped. ("aching with dread at the thought of the Ministry hearing.")

entities.name: dursleys
entities.description: Harry mentions that he cannot return to living full-time with the Dursleys now that he knows the other world. ("He could not return to living full-time with the Dursleys, not now that he knew the other world...")

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as someone who suggested Harry move into his house a year ago. ("Was it possible that he might be able to move into Sirius’s house, as Sirius had suggested a year ago...")

entities.name: azkaban
entities.description: Azkaban is mentioned as a place where Harry fears being sent if his breach of the International Statute of Secrecy was severe enough. ("had his breach of the International Statute of Secrecy been severe enough to land him in a cell in Azka-ban?")

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Hedwig is mentioned as having departed, and Harry is lying in bed on the fourth night after her departure. ("On the fourth night after Hedwig’s departure Harry was lying in...")

relationships.description: Harry fears being expelled and his wand snapped by the Ministry. ("aching with dread at the thought of the Ministry hearing.")
Harry mentions that he cannot return to living full-time with the Dursleys now. ("He could not return to living full-time with the Dursleys, not now that he knew the other world...")
Sirius suggested Harry move into his house a year ago. ("Was it possible that he might be able to move into Sirius’s house, as Sirius had suggested a year ago...")

Harry fears being sent to Azkaban if his breach of the International Statute of Secrecy was severe enough. ("had his breach of the International Statute of Secrecy been severe enough to land him in a cell in Azka-ban?")
